name: Fu Yang
story: Yan Shi came from a small village in China. He joined the PLA (People's Liberation Army) as soon as he turned 18, eager to serve his country. Yan Shi quickly showed exceptional skills in reconnaissance and was entrusted with leading a small recon unit. His calmness and attention to detail have saved the unit from several dangerous situations. Yan Shi was recently sent to Altis as part of a special forces operation to support the local OPFOR forces.
